summary: (Another) 40 minutes of additional music by an obnoxious Belgian guy.
descriptionHtml:
-NOTICE-

This mod is out of date, please head to the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28951] Additional Music Project [/url], thank you :). 

-INTRODUCTION-

Ten tracks this time, adding up to a little over 39 minutes of music. 

For the first pack, go [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15987]here[/url].

For the second pack, go [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16698]here[/url].



-CONTENTS-

There is an ESP pack with the XWM\'s and the esp, just extract it to your /music folder and check the esp. Vanilla music and other mods remain untouched, this is purely additional.  There is also a Multimedia folder with the Wav\'s and Mp3\'s.  

-PREVIEWS- 

[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EaVuJAOH0Ns]The Winged Dread[/url] Dragon Combat

[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RK-XsdMMPqs]The Eerie Places[/url] Dungeon

[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hrmlcrL79eo]Nightwanderers[/url] Exploring

[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=I9_vNQNLFcE]Windwalkers[/url] Exploring

[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZUzOFiitC7o]The Quiet Life[/url] Exploring

[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dEIxaM6EfnQ]It\'s Too Quiet[/url] Dungeon

[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VoKaW4V9Xmw]Too Close For Comfort[/url] Combat

[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lVb40qnoEtY]Midnight Walk[/url] Exploring

[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oZg5LMsMWek]Abandon All Hope[/url] Combat

[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mAKq3kxYRzc]Tundranights[/url] Exploring

Here\'s the [url=http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL1882B76E89DD57A1]playlist[/url] (these tracks are 11 through 20 :))

- SPECIAL THANKS - 

No_Aardvarks_Allowed for the great tutorial!
author: EvilBlueKoala
